column2: Kagro in the Morning is LIVE at 9 AM ET!
column5: Happy Eastern Orthodox Star Wars Day! OK clearly I am not getting that bad habit under control. Well at least we’ll have the beneficial distraction of a good old-fashioned Wednesday news roundup with Greg Dworkin. A good follow-up to yesterday’s obsession with the many facets of The Big Lie.™ Listen right here at 9:00 AM ET! Even more ways to listen live or by podcast below the fold. Ways to Listen to Kagro in the Morning: Your options to listen LIVE: And here’s a new tip: If the player hiccups or drops the audio between the shows just go ahead and stop and restart it and things should go smoothly after that. If you miss the show or just can't listen live you can: Things you can do to support the show: Thanks for all your support and enjoy the show!
